title: Rumors
body: I heard rumors that certain internet companies are purposely slowing down league. Can someone find me a list of them so I can make sure mine isn't one of them? I keep getting annoying dc in middle of game once or twice for a minute or so. That's why

replies.body: Lol doesnt usr much bandwidth i would assome they would throttle youtube and netflix long before league.

I don't have any visibility on ISP plans or changes, but we have a [Peering policy ](https://www.riotgames.com/peering-policy)that might help.  This offers info on our peering service, and a method for your ISP to contact and join Riot Direct if interested.  I hope that helps!
